meanings.definition: Relating to or marked by aphaeresis.

meanings.sent2: Her aphaeretic style of writing captivated the readers.

meanings.sent4: His aphaeretic decision to quit his job left everyone surprised.
meanings.sent5: The aphaeretic sunset painted the sky in shades of pink and orange.
